title: AI Quiz Generator
description: AI-powered quiz generator web app that dynamically creates multiple-choice quizzes based on any topic you provide.

title: Text into Speech
description: A web app that converts typed text into speech using JavaScript. Users can type text and hear it spoken aloud.

title: Login-Authentication
description: A secure and modern login authentication system built with Replit Auth, featuring multiple login methods, protected routes, and a clean, professional interface.
